p: Nigella sativa has been broadly studied in the last few decades and studies have reported that it possesses a number of medicinal properties and pharmacological actions. In order to retrieve the relevant literatures with respective subtopics, we have used PubMed, Science Direct, Scopus Google Scholar, and grey literatures using different searching terms such as “ Nigella sativa” or “Black cumin” or “Black seed” and respective disease conditions. In the case of PubMed searching, we have used the respective “Mesh” terms and text words “tw” in order to retrieve all the relevant articles regardless of time boundaries.
